title: FS2004 LUN class Ekranoplan by Alphasim
description:
LUN Ekranoplan

The Lun-class Ekranoplan was designed in the late 1980s for the Soviet Union Forces. It uses a wing-in-ground-effect concept to skim low over the water at high speeds. The Lun, Russian for &#039;Dove&#039;, is also one of the largest aircraft ever built, rivalling the size of the Spruce Goose. This aircraft is fitted with six fixed-elevation SS-N-22 Sunburn anti-ship missile launchers. It was also known colloquially as the &#039;Caspian Sea Monster&#039;. 

** FS2004 and FSX only **

Features - 

- detailed model and texture set
- true sea-skimming ability
- soundset included
- very realistic water spray fx
- engine smoke fx
- turbine glow fx
- animated engine nozzles (tilt down at full throttle)
- animated opening forward missile tubes (uses tailhook)
- top-quality panel and gauge set
- detailed cockpit with rear stations also modelled
- animated levers and switches in v-c
- animated crew doors
- animated flaps and ventral deflector 
- landing and nav lights
- v-c rain fx (FS9 only)


PLEASE SEED
